ot_widgets_about_author-3.title: About Blog Author
ot_widgets_about_author-3.text: Hi! My name is David, creator of this website. I’ve been traveling the world since 2006 and created this website to help others travel more while spending less. Growing up in New York, I was never a big traveler...
